name: Stripe
description: Stripe is a technology company that builds economic infrastructure for the internet. Businesses of all sizes use our software and APIs to accept payments, send payouts, and manage their businesses online.

benefits.title: Full Healthcare
benefits.description: We believe in thriving communities and that starts with our team being happy and healthy.

benefits.title: Unlimited Vacation
benefits.description: You should have a flexible schedule that makes space for family, wellness, and fun.

benefits.title: Skill Development
benefits.description: We believe in always learning and leveling up our skills.

benefits.title: Remote Working
benefits.description: Work from home, coffee shop, or anywhere when you feel like it.
